overview: These teens have been so naughty that they deserve a spanking! And they get it again and again in every scene of this slap-happy hardcore fuck fest that keeps wayward teens in line! From a bad-ass slut who's disrupting school with her revealing clothes, to a halfway house delinquent who can't follow rules, to a family black sheep with no respect for authority these hottie young teens are gonna get what they deserve! A red hot spanking and plenty more.
title: Bad Teens Get Punished
